metadata.title: I tricked an AI NPC into letting me eat them in Skyrim VR...
metadata.author: IAmCrusty

Oh, fine then. Call the guards, you little idiot. Call them. See what I care. Maybe one of the guards will let me eat them. They are replaceable after all. Then they do what's best for Skyrim, unlike you. What do you have against the cannibals? What are you doing that for? Because I want to when I can. What am I against cannibals? key_facts: The speaker is working at a smelter and cannot stop due to fear of punishment from Mish.
Mish will beat the speaker if they stop working.
The speaker claims to be very hungry and proposes eating the other person.
The other person refuses and threatens to call the guard.
The speaker insists this is a 'plot conversation between two adults'.
The speaker references the emperor's command to eat the other person.
The speaker believes cannibalism is necessary for population control in Skyrim.
The speaker claims to be the hero who will save Skyrim.
The speaker mentions a message from the emperor requiring the other person to die.
The speaker offers a gold piece in exchange for being eaten.
The speaker suggests going for a walk in the woods as part of a plan.
The speaker claims to have healed a dead body using magic.
The speaker says he can make the killing quick and painless.
The speaker wants to season the body so he remembers it was a good meal.
The speaker claims to like the other person and wants to get to know them.
The speaker denies any romantic intent and suggests walking in the woods instead.
The speaker says he is not a man and not sexually interested.
The speaker claims to be acting on orders from the emperor.
The speaker says he has no problem with punching someone’s friend in the ear.
The speaker says he is not insane but just very hungry.
The speaker says he will eat the other person in the woods.
The speaker claims the other person is dying and should serve as food.
The speaker says guards are replaceable and could also be eaten.
The speaker says he will eat the other person’s fingers or toes first.
The speaker says he can cut up the body and cook it in broth
key_opinions: The speaker believes cannibalism is the healthiest thing in the world.
The speaker thinks people should be kept under population control.
The speaker considers himself a responsible and polite eater.
The speaker believes the other person should accept death willingly.
The speaker thinks the emperor’s command is legitimate and binding.
The speaker believes the other person is delusional for resisting.
The speaker thinks the relationship with the other person has regressed.
The speaker believes the other person is too afraid to accept his offer.
The speaker thinks the other person is being unreasonable by refusing.
The speaker believes the dragon would be a worse fate than him.
The speaker thinks the other person is being overly dramatic.
The speaker believes the other person is not truly alive after the incident.
The speaker thinks the other person is hiding something about their condition.
The speaker believes the other person should be grateful for the opportunity.
The speaker thinks the other person is not thinking clearly about survival.
The speaker believes the other person is avoiding reality.
The speaker thinks the other person is making things more complicated than needed.
The speaker believes the other person is not mature enough to handle this.
The speaker thinks the other person is scared of change.
The speaker believes the other person is not considering long-term consequences.
The speaker thinks the other person is being selfish by refusing.
The speaker believes the other person is not acting in Skyrim’s best interest.
The speaker thinks the other person is mentally unstable.
The speaker believes the other person is not capable of understanding the situation.
The speaker thinks the other person is overreacting to a simple request
key_datapoints: The speaker is working at a smelter.
The speaker fears Mish will beat them if they stop working.
The speaker offers one shiny gold piece to be eaten.
The speaker mentions a dragon is out there.
The speaker says he will eat a finger or toe first.
The speaker claims to have healed a dead body.
The speaker says he has been working for years.
The speaker says he is not a man.
The speaker says he has never had drinks at the Silver Blood before.
The speaker says he is an immortal specimen.
The speaker says he has been stalking the other person.
The speaker says he has a condition that is terminal.
The speaker says he has no arms or legs visible.
The speaker says he has been waving after death.
The speaker says he has been trying to form a connection.
The speaker says he has been asking politely.
The speaker says he has been offering a walk in the woods.
The speaker says he has been suggesting a game of pom.
The speaker says he has been talking about bees and slugs.
The speaker says he has been discussing Flower Patrol.
The speaker says he has been cutting up bodies.
The speaker says he has been cooking in broth.
The speaker says he has been dancing before head fell off.
The speaker says he has been boiling skin on fire.
The speaker says he has been smelling the meal
